page.title: 11Newburgh Guides and Rangers
page.content: There is one company of{Girl Guides in Newburgh,{(1st Newburgh Company). Our leaders are called Ruby Armit and Margaret Stark.There is also a young leader called Louise Goodfellow.We meet every Friday night at 7.15 until 9.00pm.The patrols are{Red Rose, {Thistle, Forget-Me-Not, Primrose}and {Pimpernel. Every summer we go on a camp in tents. It is great fun but very hard work too. Last year (1984) we were in groups called{Sparta, Delta}and {Athens.}These are Greek names as it was an Olympic year. For children of 7-10 years there is a Brownie Guide company. For girls aged between 10 and 15 years there is the Girl Guides. Finally, for girls between the ages of 15 and 18 years our newly formed Ranger Guide unit.
